1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Date using the Modified Julian Day (MJD).
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Date
6  ( -- * Data type
7    Date (..), Ymd,
8
9    -- * Creation
10    dateFromMjd,
11    dateFromYmd,
12    dateFromYwd,
13    dateFromYd, 
14
15    -- * Conversion
16    monthly, weekly, yearly,
17
18    -- * Utility
19    dateAltMjd, dateAdd,
20    mix02,
21  ) where
22
23import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                    as Tim
24import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate           as Tim
25import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.OrdinalDate        as Tim
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Parts       as T
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Message          as Msg
30
31
32-- ----------------------  Type
33
34-- | Date.
35data Date
36    = Monthly T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-MM-DD/
37    | Weekly  T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-#WW-D/
38    | Yearly  T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-##D/
39
40instance Eq Date where
41    (==) = O.ordEq
42
43instance Ord Date where
44    a `compare` b = T.toMjd a `compare` T.toMjd b
45
46instance Show Date where
47    show d@(Monthly _) = "Date " ++ B.encode d
48    show d = "Date " ++ B.encode d ++ " (" ++ B.encode (monthly d) ++ ")"
49
50instance T.ToMjd Date where
51    toMjd = dateMjd
52    
53-- | Get the internal Modified Julian Day.
54dateMjd :: Date -> T.Mjd
55dateMjd (Monthly day)  = day
56dateMjd (Weekly  day)  = day
57dateMjd (Yearly  day)  = day
58
59-- | Type for year, month, and day.
60type Ymd = (T.Year, T.Month, T.Day)
61
62
63-- ----------------------  Encode
64
65instance B.MixEncode Date where
66    mixEncode = dateToMix
67
68-- | Encode date.
69dateToMix :: Date -> B.MixText
70dateToMix date =
71    case date of
72      Monthly d   -> dateMonth $ Tim.toGregorian    d
73      Weekly  d   -> dateWeek  $ Tim.toWeekDate     d
74      Yearly  d   -> dateYear  $ Tim.toOrdinalDate  d
75    where
76      dateMonth (y, m, d)  = B.mixDec y `hy`    mix02 m    `hy` mix02 d
77      dateWeek  (y, w, d)  = B.mixDec y `hyw`   B.mixDec w `hy` B.mixDec d
78      dateYear  (y, d)     = B.mixDec y `hyord` B.mixDec d
79
80      hy    = B.mixInfix "-"
81      hyw   = B.mixInfix "-#"
82      hyord = B.mixInfix "-##"
83
84-- | Create mix text with two-width zeros.
85--
86--   >>> mix02 5
87--   MixText "05"
88--
89mix02 :: Int -> B.MixText
90mix02 = B.mixDecZero 2
91
92
93-- ----------------------  Creation
94
95-- | Create date from the Modified Julian Day.
96--
97--   >>> dateFromMjd (55555 :: Int)
98--   Date 2010-12-25
99--
100dateFromMjd :: (T.ToMjd n) => n -> Date
101dateFromMjd = Monthly . T.toMjd
102
103-- | Create date from year, month, and day.
104--
105--   >>> dateFromYmd 2013 4 18
106--   Right Date 2013-04-18
107--
108--   >>> dateFromYmd 2013 4 31
109--   Left ...
110--
111dateFromYmd :: T.Year -> T.Month -> T.Day -> B.Ab Date
112dateFromYmd y m d =
113    case Tim.fromGregorianValid y m d of
114      Just day -> Right $ Monthly day
115      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y m d
116
117-- | Create date from year, week, and day.
118--   Day 1 for Monday, 2 for Tuesday, ..., and 7 for Sunday.
119--
120--   >>> dateFromYwd 2013 16 4
121--   Right Date 2013-#16-4 (2013-04-18)
122--
123dateFromYwd :: T.Year -> T.Week -> T.Day -> B.Ab Date
124dateFromYwd y w d =
125    case Tim.fromWeekDateValid y w d of
126      Just day -> Right $ Weekly day
127      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y w d
128
129-- | Create date from year and day.
130--
131--   >>> dateFromYd 2013 108
132--   Right Date 2013-##108 (2013-04-18)
133--
134dateFromYd :: T.Year -> T.Day -> B.Ab Date
135dateFromYd y d =
136    case Tim.fromOrdinalDateValid y d of
137      Just day -> Right $ Yearly day
138      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y 0 d
139
140
141-- ----------------------  Form conversion
142
143-- | Convert date into monthly date.
144--
145--   >>> monthly $ dateFromMjd 55555
146--   Date 2010-12-25
147--
148monthly :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
149monthly = Monthly . T.toMjd
150
151-- | Convert date into weekly date.
152--
153--   >>> weekly $ dateFromMjd 55555
154--   Date 2010-#51-6 (2010-12-25)
155--
156weekly :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
157weekly  = Weekly . T.toMjd
158
159-- | Convert date into yearly date.
160--
161--   >>> yearly $ dateFromMjd 55555
162--   Date 2010-##359 (2010-12-25)
163--
164yearly :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
165yearly  = Yearly . T.toMjd
166
167
168-- ----------------------  Utility
169
170-- | Alter the Modified Julian Day of date.
171dateAltMjd :: O.Map T.Mjd -> O.Map Date
172dateAltMjd f (Monthly day)  = Monthly $ f day
173dateAltMjd f (Weekly  day)  = Weekly  $ f day
174dateAltMjd f (Yearly  day)  = Yearly  $ f day
175
176-- | Add days.
177--
178--   >>> dateAdd 7 $ dateFromMjd 55555
179--   Date 2011-01-01
180--
181dateAdd :: (Integral n) => n -> O.Map Date
182dateAdd = dateAltMjd . Tim.addDays . fromIntegral
